item.title: Learning Languages
item.description: ^ The Loves of My Life INTRO Throughout my journey learning coding in different languages, I often relate it to my personal journey learning different spoken languages. Although I grew up in the traditional Texas suburb, inside the walls of my house was a diverse and exciting mix of heritage. My parents prioritized learning English, however, I felt a piece of my identity as a multiracial woman missing as I could speak little Spanish and even less Bengali.
